title: Transcendence
aboutArtist: Ekaitza creates detailed cryptoart that draws inspiration from his past as well as a vision for a digital future. He collects and advises on some of the most monumental projects in NFTs. We could not be more excited to have the ability to work with such an influence in the space.

recentWork.title: A sudden change in the tide

title: Zebra Forest
aboutArtist: Mankind is an award winning digital artist with an eminent background in branding, digital art and advertising. He has been educating others of Crypto Art for several years. After a near death experience, a mental existential struggle began that he found echoed the pages of 'Confession' by Leo Tolstoy: “Since death is inevitable, what is the meaning of life?” He found the answer of hope through exploring, creating and sharing.

title: Fall
aboutArtist: Years of thought on how to express the inexpressible has led Han down the path of Crypto and Digital Art. When asked about the inspiration behind his simplistic designs, he responds that he does it to show “All that I can't say”

title: Pulvis et umbra sumus
aboutArtist: Vince has made a name for himself in the traditional art world through painting tattoed underworld figures and gangsters. He has never before launched an artwork on a NFT platform, and we look forward to seeing what he brings to his genesis drop! If the unique side wins Vincent’s auction the winnner will have the option to receive Vince’s physical painting

title: Destroying David
aboutArtist: Alessandro Pautasso was born in 1982. Art director and Illustrator, his specialty lies in digital art and mixed media. In childhood, after falling in love with a Beatles's illustration book by Alan Aldridge,  he began drawing almost daily. Attracted by visual arts, he decided to start a career as a commercial artist and simultaneously focusing on digital art.  His works were featured in several international newspapers, magazines, key-arts, cd-covers and books.

title: Jaime el hortaliza
aboutArtist: Veteran 3D art director who has worked for Nickelodeon, Wired and Prada.

Ben Mauro has been a leading concept designer and art director in the game and film industries for over a decade. He is the creator of the HUXLEY™ graphic novel series, EVOLUTION nft collectible series and has worked on projects such as Halo, Call of Duty, Elysium, Metal Gear Solid (film), The Hobbit trilogy and many more!

He is the creator of the HUXLEY™ graphic novel series, EVOLUTION nft collectible series and has worked on projects such as Halo, Call of Duty, Elysium, Metal Gear Solid (film), The Hobbit trilogy and many more!

Ben Mauro has been a leading concept designer and art director in the game and film industries for over a decade. He is the creator of the HUXLEY™ graphic novel series, EVOLUTION nft collectible series and has worked on projects such as Halo, Call of Duty, Elysium, Metal Gear Solid (film), The Hobbit trilogy and many more!

Joseba Elorza (a.k.a. MiraRuido) is a freelance illustrator and animator. His collages have been seen in publications like Wall Street Journal, Esquire or Hollywood Reporter and he directed and animated videos for National Geographic, Amazon Studios and Green Day among others.

title: Cloudy Thoughts
aboutArtist: Bryan Brinkman is an award-winning multi-media artist who utilizes his career in animation and motion graphics to create fun and playful works about the crypto-verse. Using a variety of digital tools, he creates fun and inventive ways to convey ideas that are both approachable and appealing.

title: Solitude 2.0
aboutArtist:
Jos is a digital artist from Buenos Aires. He builds semi-static surreal worlds to share his perception: everything is as beautiful as it is absurd. But there are wonders everywhere and they manifest themselves for those who take the time to stop and observe. 
 
 His main interests are surreal scenarios, dyspotic imagery, and the representation of our link to the cosmos. He began his journey in the NFT ecosystem in October 2020 and his works are already in the hands of prestigious collectors in the community.

title: PATH
aboutArtist: LOREM is a self-taught creative who has worked all over the world with the ability to define motion and precisely encapsulate the emotion within.

title: CoKing
aboutArtist: Veteran 3D art director who has worked for Nickelodeon, Wired and Prada.

title: Portal
aboutArtist: Fran Rodríguez a.k.a. lacabezaenlasnubes (Spanish for “head in the clouds”) is a digital artist based in Barcelona. He has been creating dreamy and psychedelic images for the last 15 years. He’s worked for bands like Weezer, Twin Shadow and many of the big names in Spanish indie music.

title: Everything's New
aboutArtist: Nate Hill is a digital artist and freelance photographer from Melbourne, Australia. Nate took the long way around to finding his calling as an artist. He went from a visual arts degree, to playing/recording/touring in various bands, to teaching. While teaching (Drums) he worked part time as a portrait photographer, coupled with being a stay at home Dad. Now he has found his groove with a mix of photography, videography, photo manipulation, digital art and design. Nate has worked with a number of high profile clients including Apple, Disney/Star Wars, Warner Music, and Foot Locker. His work has also been featured and shared far and wide on social media by high profile accounts including Adobe Photoshop, Juxtapoz Magazine, and Photographize Magazine just to name a few. Nate's work is largely influenced by music and he is passionate about working with bands and artists creating visuals to accompany their music. He has a recognisable style of his own that includes his ongoing series of wild black and white line 'Digital Landscapes' and his series of photo manipulations that he titled 'Twisted Landscapes' that was the subject of his first solo exhibition.

title: Reborn
aboutArtist: Nachei is a 3D artist, art director and animator. He has worked with clients such as Nike, CocaCola and Fox, among others. His background is a mix of industrial design, architecture, nature elements and the coexistence of all of them in a unique digital imagery of static or moving images that have a particular atmosphere in which to immerse ourselves. We then begin to discover its secrets through the details. Nachei tells stories, not just images.

title: WAYP0INT
aboutArtist: Past, present and future happen at the same time. Nature and technology are bound to coexist in symbiosis while humans, AI and fantastic creatures work towards achieving the same goals, in unity.

title: Joyland
aboutArtist:
Van Orton are twin brothers from Italy. 
 
 Their art is influenced by pop culture, inspired by stained-glass windows of churches and evolved with geometric inserts and lines of light. They started out by reinterpreting cult movies of the 1980s, which led to their being contracted by brands including Disney, Microsoft, Armani and BMW.

title: BIBL3
aboutArtist: Alotta Money's artwork are like cyberdelic pills mixed with crypto currency anarcho propaganda, triple dipped in nonsense.

title: REDsistance - Fighter 71
aboutArtist:
Gabriel Suchowolski ( microbians ) is a Creative, Art Director at Domestika and has worked on design, illustration, and motion graphics. He has specialized in solving projects that mix programming, animation, and design. About his art, some people have described his work as retro-Japanese-futurism but maybe is more under the sci-fi and cyber-punk mix with some Japanese influence. 

 He was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina in 1972 but then moved to Spain where he currently lives. He has a personal passion for illustration and a love for drawing. 

 He likes playing piano and composes contemporary music, good 50's movies, and Earl Grey tea. 

 Occasionally he also fancies a bit of programming. Since he was a kid, he has flirted with technology and computer geekiness, which together with his interest in illustration has encouraged him to get involved with the creation of little multimedia pieces that often conceive as his personal artistic expressions.

title: Lost in Space
aboutArtist: Ollorens has spent the last 15 years working as an illustrator for both national and international clients (from The Washington Post to Vanity Fair, with campaigns for companies such as Coca-Cola, United Nations or Cirque du Soleil). Parallel to his commercial work he has also had extensive experience as a plastic artist, with individual and collective exhibitions (Madrid, Barcelona, Paris, NY, Mexico City ...)

title: Geodiversity of an Exoplanet
aboutArtist: Leo Isikdogan is a researcher, engineer, and artist based in California. He has a master's degree focused on computer vision for art analysis, and a PhD from the Laboratory for Image and Video Engineering at The University of Texas at Austin. Currently, he works as a Deep Learning Algorithm Engineer at Apple. His practice spans a broad range of disciplines, including artificial intelligence, computer vision, computational photography, image processing, augmented reality, and digital art.

title: Burden and Time
aboutArtist: Machado Leão is a Brazilian digital artist who makes surreal collages. He currently has over 50k followers on his Instagram and works for the music industry creating cover art for music projects. His digital collection can be licensed through Art Grab.

title: The Illuminator
aboutArtist: Machado Leão is a Brazilian digital artist who makes surreal collages. He currently has over 50k followers on his Instagram and works for the music industry creating cover art for music projects. His digital collection can be licensed through Art Grab.

title: Wild Horses (ft. HOLLY)
aboutArtist: Machado Leão is a Brazilian digital artist who makes surreal collages. He currently has over 50k followers on his Instagram and works for the music industry creating cover art for music projects. His digital collection can be licensed through Art Grab.

title: Mr. Brown's Garden
aboutArtist: Blake Jamieson is a pop portrait artist in Brooklyn, NY. Originally from California, Blake's path to becoming an artist was far from a straight line. After studying Economics at UC Davis, Blake worked in digital marketing for nearly a decade. At the age of 30, Blake decided it was time to stop building someone else's dream, and follow his own path. Self-taught in the arts, but a veteran of brand-building, Blake built within the niche of professional sports. Blake has painted portraits for over 500 professional athletes in the NFL, NBA, MLB, MLS, and NHL. He is a licensed artist with Topps, where his art is printed on baseball cards. After discovering NFTs in early 2020, Blake again leveraged his marketing and community building skills to quickly build a name for himself in the NFT space. Blake has seen success with his individual NFTs, as well as collaborations with athletes like Terrell Owens and Dez Bryant, and is also the Art Director for Knights of Degen.

title: JOYWORLD Portal, Sandstone Headland
aboutArtist:
John Orion Young (JOY) is a fourth generation artist and sculptor exploring new ways of creating, distributing, and experiencing art through innovative technologies of AR, VR, and blockchain. 

 JOY is the first artist to create and launch their own NFT contract and minted the first 3D art on the blockchain in 2018. JOY is creating JOYWORLD, an immersive metaverse experience to make you feel JOYful and creative.

title: The Symbiont World
aboutArtist:
For over a decade Jimmy Duda has been a visual storyteller, senior concept artist, and art director for a multitude of media, including film, streaming services, architectural visualizations, and commercials.

He is an active member of the Visual Effects Society and worked on projects such as Shang Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, Wheel of Time, Guardians of the Galaxy 2, Black Widow, The Suicide Squad, and many more.

Jimmy is the creator of ‘Symbiont World’, an ongoing series of eco-futuristic, solarpunk artworks, that explore a unique, post-apocalyptic, yet hopeful and inviting world.

The series has been exhibited at the digital art festival ‘Digitale-Düsseldorf’ in 2021 and at the ‘Adobe Behance Dribble’ conference in 2016.

title: Temples of Old Energy
aboutArtist:
For over a decade Jimmy Duda has been a visual storyteller, senior concept artist, and art director for a multitude of media, including film, streaming services, architectural visualizations, and commercials.

He is an active member of the Visual Effects Society and worked on projects such as Shang Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, Wheel of Time, Guardians of the Galaxy 2, Black Widow, The Suicide Squad, and many more.

Jimmy is the creator of ‘Symbiont World’, an ongoing series of eco-futuristic, solarpunk artworks, that explore a unique, post-apocalyptic, yet hopeful and inviting world.

The series has been exhibited at the digital art festival ‘Digitale-Düsseldorf’ in 2021 and at the ‘Adobe Behance Dribble’ conference in 2016.

title: Genesis Nova
aboutArtist:
For over a decade Jimmy Duda has been a visual storyteller, senior concept artist, and art director for a multitude of media, including film, streaming services, architectural visualizations, and commercials.

He is an active member of the Visual Effects Society and worked on projects such as Shang Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, Wheel of Time, Guardians of the Galaxy 2, Black Widow, The Suicide Squad, and many more.

Jimmy is the creator of ‘Symbiont World’, an ongoing series of eco-futuristic, solarpunk artworks, that explore a unique, post-apocalyptic, yet hopeful and inviting world.

The series has been exhibited at the digital art festival ‘Digitale-Düsseldorf’ in 2021 and at the ‘Adobe Behance Dribble’ conference in 2016.

title: Artificial Nature
aboutArtist: Jos is a digital artist and art curator from Buenos Aires, Argentina. His main interests when creating new works are surreal scenarios, dystopian imagery and the representation of our link with the cosmos. His works usually revolve around the same concepts: small figures living in solitude and surrounded by imposing scenarios in an attempt to portray the overwhelming beauty of the world around us in relation to an insignificant human presence in that context and at the same time visibly invasive. He began his journey in the NFT community as a digital artist in October 2020, and his works, mainly exhibited on SuperRare, are already in the hands of prestigious collectors around the world. As a curator, he focuses on the pursuit of artistic excellence with the goal of amplifying the voices of new generations of creators in the community. He is the curatorial mastermind and heart of Suspended Soul: through his analysis and dissemination of artworks by stellar emerging figures, he brings to life the conceptual ideas behind each collection, as well as crafting Suspended Soul's acclaimed curatorial reviews, which add value to the experience for artists and collectors alike.

title: The Wizard
aboutArtist:
Luis Toledo a.k.a. Laprisamata is an artist based in Madrid (Spain).

Thanks to his particular graphic style he has developed projects for companies such as Warner Music, Atlantic Records, EA Games or Y&R. 

Internationally recognised with the Wacom Awards, Awards Pantone or Behance National Design Awards, his work has also been published in prestigious magazines like Juxtapoz , Hi-Fructose, Computer Arts, Digital Arts, DPI, El País or Kult Magazine. 

 Toledo's artwork has been exhibited in Denver, Amsterdam, Madrid, Singapore, Portugal and Chicago. His design works have also illustrated the music of bands like Weezer, Gary Clark Jr., Antemasque (The Mars Volta), Big Wild, Residente and Caravan Palace and the first novel of  Pete Townshend (The Who)

title: Smile, is the Apocalypse
aboutArtist:
Buba Viedma is a graphic designer and illustrator from Madrid. He grew up in a neighborhood and a time when going out after sunset meant coming home without shoes. It was much more practical to stay at home watching cartoons, reading and, of course... drawing. 

 In 2003, he grew tired of washing towels in a hotel basement and thought that working in the graphics business would be better for his back pain than load 200kg washing machines. He then began a long journey through printers, design studios and advertising agencies, while continuing to train as an illustrator and doing freelance work for small clients. 

 In 2011 he started doing these freelance jobs under the brand Mentecalamar Studio. Here he could enjoy different styles and graphic languages ​​without the plastic restrictions of doing it under a personal signature. And that's how in early 2014 he decided to bet on the studio and work on his own. In her spare time he cleans his house, does the laundry, cooks and fights against evil; although it is enough to watch the news to realize that he does not have much time for that.

title: Freezing Spite
aboutArtist: Vector artist playing with geometry, composition and color to catch the eye. My work is based on these three principles, fed by avant-garde movements such as constructivism and cubism, adding my personal touch with futuristic, mythological or fantastic references. In my work I explore concepts under my visual perspective, exploring my mind and soul to express myself in an abstract way.

title: Blazing Revenge
aboutArtist: Vector artist playing with geometry, composition and color to catch the eye. My work is based on these three principles, fed by avant-garde movements such as constructivism and cubism, adding my personal touch with futuristic, mythological or fantastic references. In my work I explore concepts under my visual perspective, exploring my mind and soul to express myself in an abstract way.

title: Rise and Shine
aboutArtist: As one of the original Instagram influencers, Elise Swopes learned to connect with a worldwide audience of millions by melding art with a message. Since then, the Brooklyn-based digital artist has worked on countless campaigns showcasing her surreal cityscapes and colorful style. She’s established herself as a leader in the crypto field through her top-selling artwork and tireless support of other creators. Her website, Youtube channel, podcast, and social media channels are resources for anyone hoping to find inspiration or establish their own business.

title: LG's Holo Icon Pack Auction
aboutArtist: The First Mint is what happens when NFT experts and enthusiasts come together. We’re passionate day-one NFT adopters with the data chops to back up our analysis, an interest in turning raw numbers into stories, and the willingness to share our insight with the community.
